name: Aurons Oranges Demo
description:
Hey all, this is a demo for the game "Aurons Oranges" (Auron is my name so it makes sense).  This is a demo so consider it a sponge for feedback.  Anything you think I should add, improve, or discard, if ya feel, let me know in the comments. 

Update : If you are playing this after April 5th, I made a change to the controls and tweaked some other things so definitely check out the instructions tab to inform yourself.
